:mod:`api.vm.other`
===================

/vm/*(hostname_or_uuid)*/screenshot
-----------------------------------

.. autofunction:: api.vm.other.views.vm_screenshot

    |es example|:

    .. sourcecode:: bash

        es create /vm/example.cust.erigones.com/screenshot

    .. sourcecode:: json

        {
            "url": "https://my.erigones.com/api/vm/example.cust.erigones.com/screenshot/", 
            "status": 200, 
            "method": "POST", 
            "text": {
                "status": "SUCCESS", 
                "result": {
                    "image": "", 
                    "returncode": 0, 
                    "message": "Sent nmi sysrq to VM example.cust.erigones.com\nSent screenshot sysrq to VM example.cust.erigones.com\nScreenshot saved", 
                }, 
                "task_id": "0-ad64438e-6010-4939-a97c"
            }
        }
